summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal street railway system; providing for a modification of the manner of payment for certain motor buses purchased from Mack International Truck Corporation, Kenworth Motor Truck Corporation, and Fageol Motor Sales Company, under plan or system Ordinance No. 60523; providing for the issuance of utility warrants in payment therefor; and creating and establishing a special fund to pay the principal and interest of said warrants.
